issue.title: [CF 1218] Can't Drag TMW Config
issue.body:
7.4.0-100-g89dec9f

On beta, can't drag the TMW configuration box.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy | Imported from CurseForge issue #1218 | Raw

comments.body:
Randomly started working again.

Also I figured out where to find/select all the other groups.

Edited Jun 18, 2016

> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy

Might have been another addon that isn't working 100% yet placing phantom frames on your screen - mouse enabled frames that are invisible that intercept your clicks.

Next time it happens, type /fstack and see if you can figure out which one it might be.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Hmmm, finally reproduced it. Seems to happen on all TMW windows before their scale has been changed. It doesn't happen to the icon editor much because the IE saves its scale. Other windows aren't scaleable at all...


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
